definitions.definition: A coil of wire that acts as a magnet when an electric current flows through it.

subdefinitions.definition: An electromechanical device consisting of such a coil containing a metal core , the movement of which is controlled by the current.

definitions.definition: An electromechanical switch controlled by a solenoid; solenoid switch, relay .
The region of intersection between isobaric and isopycnal surfaces.

main_definition: ( physics ) A coil of wire that acts as a magnet when an electric current flows through it.
secondary_definitions: ( electronics ) An electromechanical switch controlled by a solenoid; solenoid switch, relay .
( meteorology ) The region of intersection between isobaric and isopycnal surfaces.
